channel.title: Anime on CoNime
channel.description: Recent content in Anime on CoNime

item.title: Rooster Fighter Confirms Anime Adaptation with First Trailer
item.description: Shū Sakuratani’s action-comedy manga ‘Rooster Fighter’ is officially getting an anime adaptation. The first trailer and new key visual were unveiled on the official site and at Anime Expo 2025.

item.title: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation Season 3 Confirmed for 2026 with Official Teaser PV
item.description: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation has officially announced Season 3 for 2026. The first teaser PV was screened at Anime Expo 2025 and released on TOHO animation’s official channel.

item.title: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku Reveals Teaser PV and New Character Visual
item.description: The anime Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku has released its official teaser PV and new character visuals ahead of its July 2025 premiere. This adaptation of Saka Mikami’s manga is produced by CloverWorks.

item.title: Jigoku Sensei Nube (2025) Reveals Premiere Date, Trailer, and New Theme Songs
item.description: The ‘Jigoku Sensei Nube’ reboot is set to premiere on July 2, 2025, on TV Asahi with a one-hour special. The latest trailer showcases modern designs, new theme songs, and Ryotaro Okiayu returning as Nube.

item.title: Kimetsu no Yaiba Infinity Castle Announces Trilogy of Films with Main Trailer
item.description: Aniplex and Ufotable have released the main trailer for the ‘Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – Infinity Castle’ film trilogy, showcasing the final battle against Kibutsuji Muzan set to begin release in 2025.

item.title: Boku no Hero Academia: Vigilantes Announces Anime Season 2 for 2026
item.description: Boku no Hero Academia: Vigilantes officially confirms its Season 2 anime for 2026. The announcement came with a new teaser visual and official production video shared by the series’ X account and TOHO animation.

item.title: Gachiakuta Announces Global Premiere Screenings, Theme Songs, and New Characters Ahead of July 6 Debut
item.description: The Gachiakuta anime is set to premiere on July 6, 2025. The main PV, theme songs by Paledusk and DUSTCELL, and global screenings in 15 countries have been announced.

item.title: Jigokuraku (Hell’s Paradise) Season 2 Confirms January 2026 Premiere
item.description: Jigokuraku (Hell’s Paradise) officially confirms Season 2 for January 2026. A new teaser trailer was shown at Jump Festa with MAPPA’s production and main staff returning.

item.title: Review Ryuu to Sobakasu no Hime (Belle): The Magic of Voice, Visuals, and Emotion in a Virtual World
item.description: Mamoru Hosoda’s film Belle (Ryuu to Sobakasu no Hime) combines breathtaking visuals, moving music, and an emotional story exploring themes of loss, identity, and the courage to heal deep wounds.

item.title: N-Lite Announces Original Animated Film Chiure: Child of the Sea for 2026
item.description: Studio N-Lite has officially announced its original animated film Chiure: Child of the Sea, directed and written by Daisuke Igarashi. Set for release in Japan in 2026, the film features a surreal, fantasy-themed teaser visual.

item.title: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 3 Officially Announces Culling Game Arc
item.description: Jujutsu Kaisen has officially announced Season 3 adapting the Culling Game Arc. Studio MAPPA revealed a new teaser visual and confirmed production is underway.

item.title: Review The Garden of Words (2013): Silence That Connects Two Souls
item.description: The Garden of Words is a short film by Makoto Shinkai about an unexpected meeting between two lost souls. With breathtaking visuals and meaningful silence, it delivers a deeply emotional and touching experience.

item.title: Review Zenshuu: Natsuko's Journey Through Animation, Fate, and First Love
item.description: Zenshuu tells the unique story of Natsuko Hirose, a young animator who suddenly finds herself inside her favorite film. With striking visuals, emotive music, and a naturally unfolding first love, this series offers a calm and deeply emotional viewing experience.

item.title: Dandadan Season 2 to Air on July 3, 2025 with New Trailer and Official Theme Songs
item.description: The anime Dandadan has announced Season 2 will air starting July 3, 2025. The new trailer showcases intense action, absurd humor, and official theme songs by Aina the End and WurtS.

item.title: Kaiju No. 8 Season 2 Reveals Teaser Trailer and Gen Narumi Visual
item.description: Kaiju No. 8 Season 2 has released a teaser trailer and new character visual featuring Gen Narumi. Studio Production I.G returns to produce the anime with confirmed global streaming on Crunchyroll.

item.title: Toritsukare Otoko Anime Film Announced by Shin-Ei Animation, Premieres Fall 2025
item.description: Bandai Namco Filmworks has officially announced an anime film adaptation of Shinji Ishii’s novel ‘Toritsukare Otoko.’ This musical film is scheduled to premiere in Japan in Fall 2025.

item.title: Kagurabachi Anime Adaptation Officially Announced by CyberAgent and Shochiku
item.description: CyberAgent and Shochiku have announced an anime adaptation of Kagurabachi, the popular action manga by Takeru Hokazono. Produced by CygamesPictures, it promises thrilling duels, magic, and a dark revenge story.
